org.springframework.data.repository.support

类 PageableExecutionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.repository.support.PageableExecutionUtils

  • public class PageableExecutionUtils
extends Object
    Support for query execution using Pageable. Using PageableExecutionUtils assumes that data queries are cheaper than COUNT queries and so some cases can take advantage of optimizations.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.13

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPage

        public static <T> org.springframework.data.domain.Page<T> getPage(List<T> content,
                                                                  org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable,
                                                                  LongSupplier totalSupplier)
        Constructs a Page based on the given content, Pageable and Supplier applying optimizations. The construction of Page omits a count query if the total can be determined based on the result size and Pageable.
        参数:
        content - must not be null.
        pageable - must not be null.
        totalSupplier - must not be null.
        返回:
        the Page.
